subject: Basketball
Athletics and Sports
Coaches and Managers
Madison Square Garden
lead_paragraph: The “Fire Isiah” chants from the game crowd Saturday were as intense as ever, but Knicks ownership remains “emphatically behind” Coach Isiah Thomas.
snippet: The “Fire Isiah” chants from the game crowd Saturday were as intense as ever, but Knicks ownership remains “emphatically behind” Coach Isiah Thomas.
